data.text: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this
And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
As well the singers as the players on instruments
